name: AHRCAR
discription: Dashboard has different functionality for users and admin. A user will see his own order  and give a review if he wants. Firebase Authentication. All data is saved in MongoDB. Admin can add or delete Products. Admin can make a user to admin.The user will see all products if he login the website otherwise he will see some products.
Technology: React, Bootstrap, Firebase, hook-form, MongoDB, Heroku, Express, Node js

name: Versatile Tourism Agency
discription: Firebase Authentication(using Google) for login. All data is saved in MongoDB.A user can choose his best package and book it if he logs into this website.A user can see all his booking packages and update or delete his order if he wants.
Technology: React, Bootstrap, Firebase, hook-form, MongoDB, Heroku, Express, Node js

name: Rehana Medical College Hospital
discription: Firebase Authentication( Google or email and password) for login and registration.A user can see all medical services and choose which he needs.Specialist doctors details and appointment times are shown here.Emergency numbers and ambulance services are in here
Technology: React, Bootstrap, Firebase, Heroku, Express, Node js

name: Versatile university admission care
discription: Versatile University admission care is not only an institution, it is also an assistant to fulfill your dream. Our institution help to students achieves their goal. Our teachers give always support to the students in their education.Every year huge amount of our students get admitted to government and non-government universities. Our institution takes extra care of slow learner students.

name: Falcon-honda
discription: Mated to a six-speed transmission, the Honda CBR300R is powered by a 286cc, single-cylinder, liquid-cooled engine, producing 31PS of power at 8,500rpm and a peak torque of 27Nm at 7,250rpm.
